author: Staff Reporter
text:
Timely intervention of officials led to stopping a marriage that was scheduled to be performed for a 17-year-old girl with a 23-year-old labourer at a temple here on March 11.

Childline 1098 received tip off about the marriage. A team comprising revenue officials and officials from Social Welfare Department visited the girl house in Puduchatram and found preparations in full swing.

Warned

Officials warned the parents not to continue with the marriage. A written statement was obtained from the parents. The girl was produced before the Child Welfare Committee on Thursday.
title: Child marriage stopped in Namakkal
